items.q: ________________________ (Barcelona / be) the capital of Spain. (negative)
items.answer: Barcelona is not the capital of Spain.

items.q: ________________________ (she / like) the food at Janet's Diner. (affirmative)
items.answer: She likes the food at Janet's Diner.

items.q: ________________________ (our teacher / answer) our questions. (affirmative)
________________________ (we / study) for two hours every day. (affirmative)
items.answer: We study for two hours every day.

items.q: ________________________ (your friend / speak) English. (negative)
items.answer: Your friend does not speak English.

items.q: ________________________ (the store / be) open on Sundays. (negative)
items.answer: The store is not open on Sundays.

items.q: ________________________ (Sarah / be) ready for the test. (affirmative)
items.answer: Sarah is ready for the test.

items.q: ________________________ (my brother / drive) carefully. (negative)
items.answer: My brother does not drive carefully.

items.q: ________________________ (they / like) to dance. (negative)
items.answer: They do not like to dance.

items.q: ________________________ (my family / be) in the United States now. (negative)
items.answer: My family is not in the United States now.
